ComicInfo.Title: Hark, the Herald Angel Lives!; The Sorceress and the Sacrifice!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hark, the Herald Angel Lives!: Dr. Blake starts his new job at a free clinic. Gabriel the Air Walker comes to life in a collapsed barn and befriends young Kevin Matheson. The Air Walker takes Kevin with him to find revenge on Silver Surfer, only to be destroyed by Thor.
The Sorceress and the Sacrifice!: Karnilla arranges for Balder and Nanna to fall in love, then Karnilla forces Balder to marry her to keep Nanna from being killed.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:29:16. [Issue ID 35211]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
